textDataType.name: _entityName
textDataType.description: Name strats with alpha (_ is considered alpha) followed by alpha-numeric

clobDataType.name: _clob
clobDataType.description: CLOB data type as in RDBMS. However the field actually is a text-field in the sense that the field contains the text-key for the CLOB content

blobDataType.name: _blob
blobDataType.description: BLOB data type as in RDBMS. However the field actually is a text-field in the sense that the field contains the text-key for the BLOB content

timestampDataType.name: _timestamp
timestampDataType.description: TIMESTAMP data type as in RDBMS. Behaves like an integer, but can be convrted to date if required. Contains number of nano seconds from epoch.
